General.Name: AurosTechnology Inc.
General.Description: AUROS Technology, Inc. manufactures overlay measurement equipment in Korea. The company offers overlay metrology and pellicle/mask inspection systems to customers in metrology area of the semiconductor industry. Its products include OL-800n, OL-700n, OL-600n, OL-300n, Mercury, OL-300nw, and OL-100n. The company was formerly known as AUROS Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AUROS Technology, Inc. in 2010. AUROS Technology, Inc. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Hwaseong-si, South Korea.
